meanings.definition: A person who moderates an online community.
meanings.sent1: The mods on the forum ensure everyone follows the rules.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the hard work the mods do to keep the community safe.
meanings.sent3: The mods joked that they needed a vacation from all the online drama.
meanings.sent4: Being a mod is like being a digital sheriff, keeping the peace in the virtual town.
meanings.sent5: The mods are like the guardians of the internet, protecting users from harm.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'modifications' referring to changes made to something.
meanings.sent1: He made mods to his car to make it faster.
meanings.sent2: The mods to the software improved its performance.
meanings.sent3: The mods to the recipe made it taste even better.
meanings.sent4: Her mods to the dress transformed it into a stunning gown.
meanings.sent5: The mods to the house gave it a fresh new look.

meanings.definition: A shortened form of the word 'modern' referring to something current or up-to-date.
meanings.sent1: The phone features the latest mods in technology.
meanings.sent2: Her style is always on point with the latest mods.
meanings.sent3: The mods in fashion this season are all about bright colors.
meanings.sent4: His mods in music production set him apart from other artists.
meanings.sent5: The mods in design give the room a sleek and contemporary feel.
